text: "Whatever You Want" is a 1979 song by British band Status Quo and is the title track to their 12th studio album Whatever You Want. It went to number 4 in the United Kingdom and Belgium, number 5 in Ireland and the Netherlands, number 12 in Germany and number 22 in Australia. ==References== Category:1979 songs Category:Status Quo songs Category:Boogie rock songs
title: Whatever You Want (Status Quo song)
